column1: Smoque BBQ////So hungry and excited to try one of the most popular restaurants in Chicago
column2: my friends and I stopped here for lunch and drinks. It's BYOB so we brought a few bottles of Stella to accompany our ribs. Between 4 people
column5: and a platter of pulled pork + sides (mac & cheese
column7: and a salad. Total was $50ish. The food came out pretty fast and we digged in (after a few pictures for social medias).
